abstract: Judge William J. Zloch denied a request to delay sentencing of Bradley Birkenfeld, who admitted helping American clients of UBS evade taxes.
snippet: Judge William J. Zloch denied a request to delay sentencing of Bradley Birkenfeld, who admitted helping American clients of UBS evade taxes.
lead_paragraph: A former UBS banker, Bradley Birkenfeld, will be sentenced Aug. 21 for conspiring to help wealthy Americans evade taxes, a judge ruled on Tuesday.

headline.main: Judge Sets Date for Sentencing Ex-UBS Banker
headline.print_headline: Judge Sets Date For Sentencing Ex-UBS Banker
